title: Seconds to play
brief_description: Presents a behind the scenes account of a television broadcast of an American football game. Shows that American football is not just a sport but a scrupulously choreographed entertainment.
description: Presents a behind the scenes account of a television broadcast of an American football game. Shows that American football is not just a sport but a scrupulously choreographed entertainment.
